attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I petition the government to enforce solitary confinement for prisoners.
I would like to see a short sentence for prisoners i e 28 days No tv, No Radio`s Books or personal effects,  a nutritional diet, and slop out thier cells. give them time to reflect on what they have done.
This should deter them from commiting more crimes.
Please sign my petition to make a difference.

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Harderprisons/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
